user.title: Set up SmallTV Ultra
user.description: Enter the IP address of your SmallTV Ultra device (e.g. 192.168.0.18).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the device. Check the IP address and network.
error.not_smalltv_ultra: The device at that address is not a SmallTV Ultra. Check the IP.

data_description.refresh_interval: How often HA uploads new images to the device (minimum 60s to protect flash).
data_description.cycle_interval: How fast the device cycles through images.
